injury.name: Splinted Leg
injury.description: * While you have a Splinted Leg, you cannot be Fast. * You have Penalty on all "Fast" skills. * In your first round of combat, discard 1 card. * After two nights of rest, remove Splinted Leg. * Take 2 Corruption Points to instantly heal Splinted Leg.
injury.flavor: You're hobbling around on a splinted leg.
